data.text: @NYCMayorsOffice @NYCMayor I may have missed the 'advertising' Eric @NYCMayor; where and when did you receive a COVID vaccine? Which one did you 'roll up your sleeve' for? I'll wait! 😉

@NYCMayorsOffice Great PR... Who cares !!! People don't go back to work in New York. Make this beast starve. Overpriced dilapidated office space and horridly long commutes, crime and filth in the streets... Don't give anymore money to these Charlatans. Make the welfare people pay for this shit!

@CourtneyBlair18 I'm sure you voted for Biden and Kamala too.. 
See what a mess we're in now!
